entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 7:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Freezing rain or snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to rain showers late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
